lessons.title: Hebrew Letters
lessons.description: There are 22 Hebrew Letters, plus 4 final letters. Additionally, certain letters appear with a dagesh that changes its sound. Those letters are known as begadkefat letters. You may also see the dagesh on any other letter to indicate emphasis.

lessons.title: Hebrew Vowels
lessons.description: Here are a sample of common vowels you may see.

lessons.title: Gvurot: Letters and Vowels
